title: Let the games begin!
description: Pick a slice, any slice. Thirty-two places go head-to-head.

title: Savory 16
description: Check back beginning Aug. 1 to vote in this round.

title: Tasty 8
description: Check back beginning Aug. 3 to vote in this round.

title: Flavorful 4

title: Finals
description: The final battle for the cheesy crown begins Aug. 8. The winner will be announced Aug. 10.
